Introduction

WICC is a club at Cornell that aims to empower and support women in computing fields. This project involved completely redesigning an existing website for a more professional and visually-pleasing appearance, and developing a new website architecture to better organize existing content and revamp the way visitors traveled through the site.

Design Journey

Audience

The WICC website needed to be built for several main audiences:

  1. Students, including existing WICC members and potentially interested students.
  2. Alumni, who may be interested in joining the alumni network.
  3. Companies, who are interested in becoming a sponsor.

Design Needs and Solutions

Students Interested in WICC
